Start.name: Grocery Store
Start.desc: A quiet store that seems to be abandoned for some time.

items.desc: A poster for the annual festival of the city.
items.take: The poster disappeared like it was never there.

BASE.name: Basement
BASE.desc: A place filled with equipnents that you have no knowledge about.

PARK.name: Park
PARK.desc: A park designed for family enjoyment.

MOUNT.name: Mountains
MOUNT.desc: This place is now unsafe, go in the tunnel!!!

UNDTUN.name: Underground Tunnel
UNDTUN.desc: This tunnel is full of uncomforting whispers, you may want to go back.

items.desc: On the ground, you can pick it up.
items.take: Hmmm, this is actually your phone, why is it here?

CORP.name: Corporation
CORP.desc: The ultimate destination, you can enter another dimension from this location.
